articles.title: This ‘Dead’ Star Just Came Back to Life, and NASA Captured It! - Indian Defence Review
articles.description: NASA’s IXPE reveals shocking new details about a white dwarf star, giving it a cosmic second chance with stunning X-ray data.
articles.content: In an unprecedented breakthrough, NASA’s Imaging X-ray Polarization Explorer (IXPE) has captured extraordinary details of the white dwarf star EX Hydrae. Using X-ray polarization to map the energetic… [+3837 chars]
